posts.name: Alex Hart
posts.cooked:
We’re releasing the Signal 7.60 beta soon. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group here.

Share your feedback on the latest changes:

  • Nothing user facing yet. Even more backup fixes!

Complete list of new commits since 7.59.1:
https://github.com/signalapp/Signal-Android/compare/v7.59.1…main

Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.59 release
Beta backup feature not working at all

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.60.0 (159700)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

15 new commits since 7.59.1:

Show commits

  • Update to RingRTC v2.59.0 [1]

  • Bump libsignal to v0.83.0 [2]

  • Implement AppScaffold back-gesture. [3]

  • Fix BackupSubscriptionCheckJob tests. [4]

  • Log out windowsizeclass. [5]

  • Fix window insets for pixel 10 devices. [6]

  • Fix improper filename on sent media items. [7]

  • Update vote result color. [8]

  • Process notification profiles before accounts during storage sync. [9]

  • Reset backup id on zk verification failure during restore attempts. [10]

  • Fix bad state when in restore flow and become unregistered. [11]

  • Add split pane UI for new conversation screen. [12]

  • Rename AppScaffold detailContent/listContent to primaryContent/secondaryContent. [13]

  • Update translations and other static files. [14]

  • Bump version to 7.60.0 [15]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-Android v7.59.1…v7.60.0

Localization changes

Note: after clicking a link, it may take a few seconds before GitHub jumps to the file (try scrolling a bit if it doesn’t).

posts.name: ClauZ
posts.cooked:
Reproducible builds fail again…

Reproducible Build Check · Workflow runs · signalapp/Signal-Android · GitHub

So much red...

image1419×832 99.5 KB

And did somebody forget to tap the “Push to Obtainium” button ?

link_counts.title: Reproducible Build Check · Workflow runs · signalapp/Signal-Android · GitHub

posts.name: Talya (she/her)
posts.cooked: i actually suspect the two may be the result of the same thing. there’s no build on GitHub so there’s no build on Obtanium, and if i must guess it’s probably related to the many failures.

posts.name: Alex Hart
posts.cooked: I did indeed forget to push out the github build. I just did so now.

posts.name: Jeffrey
posts.cooked:
updates-bot:

Fix improper filename on sent media items. [7]

Thank you for the Fix.

Note : only new attached file is fixed. Old message with filename stay the same.

Screenshot

Screenshot_20251009_2128211216×2167 160 KB

posts.name: AlertSubject
posts.cooked:
In the Media send flow:

When you delete a media from the selection, the currently viewed picture will be reset to the very first in the selection

Makes it harder to go through photos and organize them, especially if you’re sending larger amounts of media at the same time

New Version: 7.60.1 (159800)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

5 new commits since 7.60.0:

  • Include last backup proto size in size calculation. [1]

  • Fix duplicate e164 short codes cleanup bug. [2]

  • Put poll receive support behind feature flag. [3]

  • Update translations and other static files. [4]

  • Bump version to 7.60.1 [5]

posts.cooked:
Unfortunately still unable to restore my TestFlight backup even after changing the recovery key

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.60.1/40aefbe728dbcd56857ba093b568bcb504a28eeea8af2bb61e4a2d1bdda93579

posts.name: [Android and Windows Beta]
posts.cooked:
Minor visual bug when 2 or more people in a group chat are replying. Should have something like multiple people are typing or just add even spacing.

Screenshot_20251008_134727_Signal1440×414 29.7 KB

posts.name: AlertSubject
posts.cooked: What exactly is the bug?

This is not a bug and has been always like this. Usually people have profile pictures and if they have such pictures, then it looks nice. You see that many people are writing at the same time. But you have two same colored letter fields instead of profile pictures, that looks a little bit boring and they are not easily to distinguish one from the other.

Maybe an improvement would be to add a thin circle border around the profile pictures or letters.

A GIF I received on Signal was converted to a video when I shared (not forwarded) it to someone else on Signal.

Receiving message ID: 1760206255214

Receiving/Sharing Android log: https://debuglogs.org/android/7.60.1/a05f0454d094b80d310700b3c8aa85f87dfcfa22afd65daf843429009cdae1aa

Sending Desktop log: https://debuglogs.org/desktop/7.74.0/99d25bc6cf8f6996d7be970c77689d5db85766816b047dd36e0ff02b6cf2b0b5.gz

posts.name: RandomSignalGUY
posts.cooked:
“Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.60 release” is not on section “Android Beta Feedback”

Screen 11387×572 81.4 KB

Screen 21387×469 81.7 KB

In stories I still (now on a newer phone and with Android 15 instead of 10) can’t click on see more. Nothing happens when I do, no reaction, as if the field wouldn’t exist.

The same bug on a Samsung S20 and on a Samsung S9 which I had reported a month or two before.

If this is intended and you don’t want long texts to be posted together with images, then just limit the text input field.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.60.1/021c2c002fef159e0b64a72b1cc128c1e6964c1ba5fb7edf2e6b164153fcebc9

Screenshot_20251013-065227_2775×1726 104 KB

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
I can’t download a story.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.60.1/ec025e827a444e856787997015c8f88dc96479638e0150a0db25b033fd257c0b

It says: “Failed to load content”

posts.name: Alex Hart
posts.cooked:
chiwaijm:

Note : only new attached file is fixed. Old message with filename stay the same.

Expected. The filename was never written into the database.

AlertSubject:

When you delete a media from the selection, the currently viewed picture will be reset to the very first in the selection

tracking!

Avitus:

A GIF I received on Signal was converted to a video when I shared (not forwarded) it to someone else on Signal.

Signal GIFs are always sent as MP4 due the the reduced file size. It was likely a video before you tried sharing it.

erik55:

In stories I still (now on a newer phone and with Android 15 instead of 10) can’t click on see more.

tracking!

Whatnoww:

“Failed to load content”

tracking

Hi, not sure this is new, but when I long press on a message, and tap “select”, the status bar at the top turns black:

signal-2025-10-14-1944511344×2992 129 KB

signal-2025-10-14-1946241344×2992 130 KB

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.60.1/007c1268264cb042b20a4c1ed8a4442dd94bfa311b08f44c7bf9b8e028f349ef

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming Android 7.61 release

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
My chat bubbles were spazzing jumping up and down when I sent a reply with a link to someone in a GC.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.60.1/cca2feaef82473bff7bcff57dcf3f6f32350c96c35d4d952bd92e23e1fbab006

It just gets worse over time, not accessible. I managed to record it but the flashing wasn’t as hard as the first time it happened, which was quite bothersome.

And then after sharing the video and returning to Signal, UI is broken.

10000373621075×2393 104 KB

Scrolling up or down didn’t resolve the issue, and I had to back out of the chat to reset this screen.

Edit: It seems to consistently cause the issue. Tested reproducing the exact text and it seems to work.

Steps:

  1. Have a sender device send this:
More tracking stuff done with SS7, great report.

The Surveillance Empire That Tracked World Leaders, a Vatican Enemy, and Maybe You
Inside the hidden world of First Wap, whose untraceable tech has targeted politicians, journalists, celebrities, and activists around the globe. 

https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2025/10/firstwap-altamides-phone-tracking-surveillance-secrets-assad-erik-prince-jared-leto-anne-wojcicki/
  1. Have yourself swipe the message to reply and send this:
Essentially this:

https://youtu.be/wVyu7NB7W6Y?si=4k1baVLFlRWK2KRv

So it is a practical attack
  1. Have fun watching chats dance.

posts.name: Whatnoww
posts.cooked:
Additionally, I’ve found the following issues that have cropped up on this latest update.

Long delays when sending

I sent two messages in the chat. It took maybe 3 seconds for them to actually show up and send.

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.60.1/f0aa51eeeb14c5a4a91a508b02e2340c223df0409ee1d53fe6305f4feeb3d464

1760532784124 is the message id

Unhandled media decoder errors in stories

https://debuglogs.org/android/7.59.2/6d1b377a2742dac678937a9d708b9ffc6cbe75169a51ca2b43033d2137a0b768

Currently, when trying to view a story video, if the media decoder crashes, it’ll silently stay on a black screen with no warning.
